name: Multilingual Bingo
description:
This game works like any other bingo game.

When a number is drawn, a speech service calls it out loud.

This game was created with the goal of helping people learn numbers in foreign languages. Feel free to try out different ones!

  • This game presents you only the languages installed on your device.
    If you want to play in a particular language, please check whether the language is available for your device.
